PHRASE.LANG: This pack is for all fans of musicals: it contains a the Freestyle Country routine for male avatars, and for female avatars there is the Modern Dance routine. [#Legal]
Ce pack est pour tous les fans de comédies musicales : il contient la chorégraphie Freestyle Country pour les hommes, et la Danse Moderne pour les femmes. [#Legal]
Dieser Pack ist für alle Fans des Musicals: Es enthält eine der Freestyle Country Routine für die Männer, und für die Frauen, gibt es die Modern Dance Routine. [#Legal]
Questo pack è per tutti gli appassionati di musical: contiene la coreografia Country Freestyle per gli uomini, e la Danza Moderna per le donne. [#Legal]
Este paquete es para todos los fans de los musicales: contiene la coreografía Country Freestyle para los hombres, y la Danza Moderna para las mujeres. [#Legal]
This pack is for all fans of musicals: it contains a the Freestyle country routine for male avatars, and for female avatars there is the Modern dance routine. [#Legal]
